text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
There's nothing like standing on the<n>dance floor in a
swimsuit while<n>waving a fan! This is the joy of<n>
Bubblyland, girls! Woooo!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: So this is Bubblyland!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: One month ago, during a scrimmage<n>at the academy...

text_block_list.name: Honest Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Scarlet and Spe came in dead last?!

text_block_list.name: Well-informed Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
I know Scarlet recently had a fever,<n>but I wonder why Spe
did so poorly?<n>Actually... She looks like she might've<n>
gained some weight, but...

text_block_list.name: Spe and Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Nooooo!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Huff... Huff... Huff! I can't affordto run like that anymore! I have towork even harder!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Gah! It's been a month already, but I<n>still can't get out of
my slump! What<n>should I do, Mom?!

text_block_list.name: Spe's Mother
text_block_list.text:
Listen, you need to step back and<n>take it easy! From what
you've been<n>tellin' me, you've been training<n>nonstop,
right?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I-I have been resting properly! Isleep well, take relaxing baths...

text_block_list.name: Spe's Mother
text_block_list.text:
That's not what I mean! I mean going<n>out and having fun
with your friends to<n>refresh yourself. You haven't been<n>
doing that, have you?

text_block_list.name: Spe's Mother
text_block_list.text:
Just trust me! Give it a try. Let go of<n>aaall your worries for a
while and you<n>might just find that it solves your<n>problem.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I... I suppose that's true...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
B-but if I go and hang out with friends<n>now before getting
my running back<n>on track, I'd just be slacking off!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Mama sent me something? I wonder<n>what it is.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
"I hope you like the swimsuit I got<n>you. You've been so
busy lately. Take<n>some time to visit the beach or pool<n>once
in a while, dear. Love, Mama."

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Wow! What a cute swimsuit! "Visit the<n>beach or pool," huh?
I'm glad she's<n>thinking of me, but I wonder why the<n>
sudden gift.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
She's so busy with work and usually<n>leaves me to my own
business, so<n>why... Oh...

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
(Could it be she knows how horribly I<n>did in our recent
scrimmage?!)

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
(Maybe she thinks I'm doing a poor<n>job of taking care of
myself because<n>of that... No, I'm overthinking things.<n>
There's no way she could've...)

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Ngh! I'll definitely win the next race<n>and make sure she
knows I got first<n>place!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Sigh... I can't believe I ended uparguing with Mom yesterday...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Ugh, what am I doing, wasting my<n>time out here on the
racetrack? I've<n>gotta focus! I'm going to nail training<n>
today!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
I had a feeling she'd be here! Um,<n>would you like to run with
me?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
"I haven't been able to get back into<n>shape since the
scrimmage the other<n>day, no matter what I do. Has it been<n>
the same for you, Spe?"

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
"Y-yeah! The more I think about it, the<n>more confused I get
about my running<n>form. But everything was fine<n>before..."

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
"I know what you mean. I'm in the<n>same boat. That's why I
thought<n>challenging someone to a race might<n>help me get
back into stride, so..."

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: (Clouds of dust, pounding footsteps,someone ahead of me... Yes, thisis what it's like to race! It's allcoming back to me!)

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
(All right! We're almost at the fourth<n>corner! All I've gotta
do now is work<n>these arms and legs and overtake<n>
Scarlet!)

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
(Wait, why aren't I speeding up?!<n>How am I supposed to
move my arms<n>again? Just what's my form<n>supposed to
be when I run?!)

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
(Ah! The gap between us is going to<n>widen even more if I
don't hurry! I<n>have to change gears... How do I do<n>that
again?!)

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: (Oh nooo, what should I do?!)

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Gah!

text_block_list.name: Spe and Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Pant... Pant...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
My goodness... Their forms are all<n>over the place. They
must've lost all<n>sense of their own running styles.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
I get the feeling they might've<n>forgotten some other things,
too, in<n>their panic... Hmm, if that's the case...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Hey, Spe! I know a place that'll get<n>you out of your rut and
back in<n>fantabulous form. Come with me to<n>Bubblyland!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Th-there's a place like that?!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
You betcha! I heard from Fuji that<n>you and Scarlet haven't
been doing<n>well lately, so I thought we could all<n>go.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
I've rented a car and invited our<n>sports fanatic, Tickezo, to
join us too,<n>so we're all ready to rock 'n' roll!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
That said, Scarlet passed up the offer!<n>She said she's
already got a training<n>regimen locked down. Haha!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: What about you? You down?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
(If this training facility that<n>Maruzensky's recommending
really<n>can help people get out of their<n>slumps, then maybe
it'll work for me<n>too!)

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: C-count me in!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: And so...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Spe and Tickezo, you two'd better<n>hold on tight! You're
gonna<n>experience the most amazing magic<n>at Bubblyland!

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text:
Magic?! I'm going to that Bubbly<n>whatchamacallit place too!
No one can<n>stop me!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: And now, having arrived...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: So this is Bubblyland!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Wait! I-is it actually possible to do any<n>training here?!
